channel.title: 20 Famous Software Disasters
channel.description:
Found this on a blog [url=http://www.devtopics.com/20-famous-software-disasters/]here[/url], it lists 20 software bugs that either cost millions, or killed people. I found it kinda interesting...
Discuss! :D
Imo I thought #7 was kinda funny :P

item.title: 20 Famous Software Disasters
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Cost: $475 million, corporate credibility

Disaster: Intel’s highly-promoted Pentium chip occasionally made mistakes when dividing floating-point numbers within a specific range. For example, dividing 4195835.0/3145727.0 yielded 1.33374 instead of 1.33382, an error of 0.006%. Although the bug affected few users, it become a public relations nightmare. With an estimated 5 million defective chips in circulation, Intel offered to replace Pentium chips only for consumers who could prove they needed high accuracy. Eventually Intel replaced the chips for anyone who complained.

Cause: The divider in the Pentium floating point unit had a flawed division table, missing about five of a thousand entries and resulting in these rounding errors. (more)

Read full topic

item.title: 20 Famous Software Disasters
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote="[-J O H N-"]link=topic=244491.msg2064657#msg2064657 date=1203424577]

Windows vista should be there

Oh yes of course windows vista has had a disaster. It was too horrible to ever be seen so it was covered up until I dusted it!

In 2009 Windows Vista lagged so bad during the presidants masturbation to see how long he could fill up a milk jug (2years due to tinypenisalius) and his internet browser stopped while watching a rare video of hardcore britney spears with her dildo.

He ended up getting so bad he slammed his hand down on a control panel causing windows vista advanced to send a missle activation through and the missle was targetted for the worldwide porn. He never got to finish his masterbation and he never knew how brintey spears’ video ended…

Sad ending tbh, he covered it up and put the file under his assistants name.[/quote]
go home nature freak…
